Hayes McCoy: Define Content http://localhost:1313/posts/content_mccoy_hayes/ Thu, 05 Sep 2024 05:15:42 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_mccoy_hayes/ “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D. (2016). Web Content Management. O’Reilly Media What is Content To Me? Content is a term that can refer to a broad assortment of things This can include Text Visuals Audios Games Lessons And More! For me content can be defined as a piece of information, entertainment, or an experience that is created for the pupose to inform, entertain, or persuade, and this is consumed in a format that is either digital or physical.

<<<<<<< HEAD Content_Hotko_AJ http://localhost:1313/content_hotko_aj/ Sun, 08 Sep 2024 17:47:53 -0400 http://localhost:1313/content_hotko_aj/ Content as defined by Deane Barker, “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D.( 2016). My definition of content if fairly simple, anything that humans consume that is created by humans. Some examples of content would be websites, movies, and even YouTube videos. A movie is an example of content because it was created by humans and intended for human consumption. ======= What is **Content**? - Omari http://localhost:1313/posts/content_chaplin_omari/ Tue, 10 Sep 2024 04:50:12 +0000 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_chaplin_omari/ What is Content? According to the slides and Deane Barker, content is created by editorial process and intended for consumption by a human audience. To me, content is anything we humans create and put onto the internet. Anything from blogposts, to videos, to music, to images: all of it is content! An Example One example of content in action is this awesome video by Claire Saffitz. In this video, she demonstrates one of her recipes from her book.

Formally “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D. (2016). Web Content Management. Content_mason_avery http://localhost:1313/posts/content_mason_avery/ Mon, 09 Sep 2024 16:26:16 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_mason_avery/ “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D. (2016). Web Content Management. O’Reilly Media I understand this concept as the creation of something with humans as the consumers. Videos, movies, podcasts, interviews, books and journals are some examples. Authors write books with the hopes that someone consumes them, i.e. reads their work. A chef creates a dish that he hopes customers will enjoy etc.
content_donnelly_matthew http://localhost:1313/posts/content_donnelly_matthew/ Mon, 09 Sep 2024 11:17:40 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_donnelly_matthew/ What is Content? “Definition of Content” Content would be something that users create and is “intended for consumption by a human audience” (Barker, 2016) My Definition would be technically anything can be content; however, it needs to have that editorial process and needs to be consumed by humans in the simplest of terms. Content that I regularly consume If I ever feel like some of my photos are lacking any substance, I usually check out this website my link The reason that this website is content is that this is made for a human audiences, for creatives that are looking to find inspiration or try and recreate a visual shot. >>>>>>> 692da215b822e3338b6f032660a3e2e0cc84be72
Content_Myers_Albert http://localhost:1313/posts/content_myers_albert/ Fri, 06 Sep 2024 13:27:31 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_myers_albert/ What is “content Dash talks about the phrase user generated content and how the people who generated this conent did not like the way the phrase represented them. He also talks about how a lot of younger people today refer to themselves as content creators. (Richman, 2022) In my own words I think content is any form of consumable visual element that someone makes for someone else to view.
Content_coleman_bryan http://localhost:1313/posts/content_coleman_bryan/ Thu, 05 Sep 2024 11:21:14 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_coleman_bryan/ Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication. In my own words, content is information available for either retrieval or engagement intended for users and people. One example of content that I consume regularly are golf youtube videos posted by Bryson DeChambeau. Here is my link This example illustrates the concept of content as I, the user, engage with the information, the video of Bryson golfing and giving tips as he plays, and by watching it I consume it, and the videos are edited before they are posted.
Content_nguyen_nhi http://localhost:1313/posts/content_nguyen_nhi/ Thu, 05 Sep 2024 11:18:41 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_nguyen_nhi/ What is Content? The definition of this concept definition that I’ve chosen is “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D. (2016). Web Content Management. O’Reilly Media In other words, the explanation of this concept is Content is information or ideas shared in different formats like text, images, videos, or audio. It can be found on websites, social media, blogs, and more, and is created to inform, entertain, or engage an audience.
Content_chen_ricky http://localhost:1313/posts/content_chen_ricky/ Thu, 05 Sep 2024 11:17:40 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_chen_ricky/ Content Definiton According to Deane Barker, “Content is information produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption via publication.” Barker, D.(2016). Web Content Management. O’Reilly Media In My Own Words To my understanding, content is something that takes time and money, made by human for human. Content Example An exmaple of content is Online Courses. It is something that take money and time to create, made by humans for humans.
Content_bryant_henry http://localhost:1313/posts/content_bryant_henry/ Thu, 05 Sep 2024 11:09:04 -0400 http://localhost:1313/posts/content_bryant_henry/ What is Content? According to Deane Barker in Web Content Management, content can be defined as information that was “produced through editorial process and ultimately intended for human consumption” (Barker, 2016). In other words, this means that content is something that an individual put effort into creating and that was designed and created for another individual to interact with in a meaningful way. Content Example An example of content that I consume would be a YouTube video.
